statements: SELECT * FROM SatelliteWeatherData
SELECT satellite_image_id, vegetation_health FROM SatelliteWeatherData
SELECT weather_id, vegetation_health FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE satellite_image_id = 1
SELECT * FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE vegetation_health > 0.5
SELECT MAX(vegetation_health) AS max_vegetation_health FROM SatelliteWeatherData
SELECT * FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE vegetation_health > 0.5 ORDER BY satellite_image_id DESC
SELECT AVG(vegetation_health) AS avg_health, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SatelliteWeatherData GROUP BY weather_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY avg_health ASC
SELECT satellite_image_id, MAX(vegetation_health) AS max_health FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE weather_id = 3 GROUP BY satellite_image_id
SELECT DISTINCT weather_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE vegetation_health < 0.3 GROUP BY weather_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM SatelliteWeatherData WHERE satellite_image_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
SELECT * FROM satellite_image_data ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_location, vegetation_health_score FROM satellite_image_data WHERE vegetation_health_score > 0.5;
SELECT image_id, image_timestamp, image_location FROM satellite_image_data WHERE image_location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT AVG(vegetation_health_score) AS avg_health_score FROM satellite_image_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 5;
SELECT image_id, image_location, image_timestamp, vegetation_health_score FROM satellite_image_data ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_image_data WHERE image_location = 'New York';
SELECT image_id, image_location, image_timestamp FROM satellite_image_data WHERE vegetation_health_score > 0.75 ORDER BY image_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, image_location, image_timestamp, vegetation_health_score FROM satellite_image_data ORDER BY image_location, image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_location, image_timestamp, vegetation_health_score FROM satellite_image_data WHERE vegetation_health_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_health WHERE health_index > 0.5;
SELECT image_url, temperature, humidity FROM satellite_images JOIN weather_data ON satellite_images.image_id = weather_data.weather_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND temperature > 80
SELECT si.image_url, wh.temperature, vh.health_index FROM satellite_images si JOIN weather_data wh ON si.image_id = wh.weather_id JOIN vegetation_health vh ON si.image_id = vh.image_id
SELECT * FROM satellite_images
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT image_id, image_name, timestamp FROM satellite_images ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT weather_id, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY wind_speed
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, timestamp FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY weather_date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT image_name, health_index FROM satellite_images JOIN vegetation_health ON satellite_images.image_id = vegetation_health.health_id ORDER BY health_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM satellite_images
SELECT capture_date, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_name = 'SatelliteA'
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0
SELECT * FROM satellite_images
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC
SELECT image_id, capture_date, satellite_name FROM satellite_images WHERE satellite_name='Satellite-A'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature >= 25 AND precipitation < 5
SELECT image_id, health_status, health_index FROM vegetation_health INNER JOIN image_health_mapping ON vegetation_health.health_id = image_health_mapping.health_id ORDER BY health_index DESC
